body.name: Graco TriRide 3 in 1 Car Seat | 3 Modes of Use from Rear Facing to Highback Booster Car Seat, Clybourne
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 22 hrs 37 mins
features: 3-in-1 car seat grows with your child from rear-facing harness (5-40 lb) to forward-facing harness (22-65 lb) to highback booster (40-100 lb)
Graco ProtectPlus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that help to protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes
No-Rethread Simply Safe Adjust Harness System allows the headrest and harness to adjust together in one motion
Choose the perfect headrest height from 10 positions to get the safest fit for your growing child
6-position recline keeps your child comfy and helps for a better installation
body.description: The Graco® TriRide™ 3-in-1 Car Seat helps to keep your little one safe from baby to big kid, through 3 modes of use: rear-facing harness (5-40 lb), forward-facing harness (22-65 lb), and highback booster (40-100 lb). The No-Rethread Simply Safe Adjust™ Harness System allows you to adjust the height of the headrest and harness in one motion, helping to save you time and ensure your child is properly secured. Choose the perfect headrest height from 10 positions and adjust the seat to 6 recline positions for a better installation. The easy-to-read level indicator helps eliminate installation guesswork and the car seat is LATCH-equipped for easy installation. The integrated harness storage compartment keeps the harness safely stored away, without removing, while in belt-positioning booster mode. Open-loop belt guides help properly position your vehicle’s seat belt across your child in highback booster mode. 2 easy-to-clean cup holders keep your child's drinks and snacks close at hand, and the seat pad is comfortable and machine washable for your convenience. Removable plush head and body inserts help to keep your infant feeling cradled and comfortable. Steel-reinforced frame provides strength and durability for years of use. This car seat is Graco® ProtectPlus Engineered™ to help protect in frontal, side, rear, and rollover crashes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Promise No matter what life brings our way, the one constant is the love we feel for our kids. That’s why we’ve done the research and the testing to thoughtfully design Graco products. As your family grows, we’ll be right there with you. Everyone is welcome in the Graco family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatility and Comfort: A Parent's Dream Car Seat!
reviews.reviewText: Purchasing the GRACO TriRide 3 in 1 Car Seat has been a decision I won't soon regret! From the first installation, it was clear that this seat was designed with not just safety in mind, but also parental convenience and child comfort.The transition from rear-facing to highback booster is a breeze, thanks to the user-friendly manual and intuitive design. My child, who tends to be fussy about car rides, seems notably more comfortable, likely due to the plush insert and multiple recline positions.I appreciate the integrated cup holders, perfect for snacks and drinks, minimizing the mess during our journeys. Additionally, the machine-washable seat pad makes clean-up stress-free, which is a huge plus for any busy parent.But, above all, it's the peace of mind this seat provides that's most impressive. The robust build, coupled with the visible and easy-to-understand safety features, assures me during every trip that my little one is secure.In summary, the GRACO TriRide excels in all departments, making car rides smoother and safer. Highly recommended for anyone in the market for a reliable, long-term car seat solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We transitioned from our infant car seat ti this one and our baby was way more comfortable and didn’t fuse as much. I will say this car seat is a little more difficult tightening up. Other then that no complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Car Seat Upgrade
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this car seat for my 1 year old to transition into a larger car seat. I can honestly say this was a very affordable choice that gave me piece of mind when it comes to our little ones safety.After reviewing all the instructions, installation was a breeze. It came with both hard connectors to attach to the seats in addition to the seat belt for forward facing set up. My little guy fit comfortably after properly adjusting the straps to his shoulder length as well. Looking forward to hanging on to this car seat for a while as it does adjust very nicely as he grows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great car seat for your car
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is for use in your car only. It does not have a carry handle to use outside of the car or use in a stroller or shopping cart. So, when getting ready for the birth and delivery at the hospital, we realized we needed one that can fit in a stroller, or have a carry handle, that comes in a set, in order to transport the newborn from the hospital to the car to home. It's a great seat and grows with your baby. But just remember this is a great one for the car only and stays there until you need to change the positions for when the baby grows. We have two, one for each car and then one other type that has a handle for carrying and fits in a stroller. The stroller will last you along time because the baby will grow into it and no longer fit in the seat with the handle. FYI

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Graco TriRide 3 in 1 Car Seat: A Safe and Versatile Choice for Your Child
reviews.reviewText: Graco TriRide 3 in 1 Car Seat: A Safe and Versatile Choice for Your ChildIf you are looking for a car seat that can grow with your child, you might want to consider the Graco TriRide 3 in 1 Car Seat. This car seat can be used in three different modes: rear-facing, forward-facing, and highback booster. It can accommodate children from 4 to 100 pounds, making it a long-lasting investment for your family.One of the best features of the Graco TriRide 3 in 1 Car Seat is its safety. It has a steel-reinforced frame, a five-point harness, and an easy-to-adjust headrest that provide optimal protection for your child in case of a crash. It also has side-impact protection and energy-absorbing foam that reduce the impact of a collision. The car seat meets or exceeds all US safety standards and has been rigorously tested for structural integrity.Another great feature of the Graco TriRide 3 in 1 Car Seat is its versatility. It can be easily installed using either the vehicle seat belt or the LATCH system, and it has four recline positions to ensure a comfortable ride for your child. It also has a removable cup holder, a machine-washable seat pad, and a harness storage compartment that make it convenient for parents. The car seat can be converted from rear-facing to forward-facing to highback booster mode with just a few simple steps, and it has an integrated belt-positioning guide that helps you adjust the seat belt correctly for your child.The Graco TriRide 3 in 1 Car Seat is a safe and versatile choice for your child. It offers excellent value for money and can last for years. It has received many positive reviews from satisfied customers who praise its quality, durability, and ease of use. If you are looking for a car seat that can adapt to your child's changing needs, you might want to give the Graco TriRide 3 in 1 Car Seat a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort is Key
reviews.reviewText: The safety rating are true and this seat looks sleek. My baby loves singing it and appear super comfortable. Easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great car seat
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy. Great quality. Easy to clean and install into your car. Really confortable. Easy to switch mode as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this car seat so much I bought my daughter one for her son who I babysit. It is made very well. I feel he is very safe in the car seat and it’s easy to take him in and out and also to move to another vehicle, I highly recommend it.

Andaba preocupado por lo que mencionan del ruido del balín del nivel. Si lo llegué a escuchar 2 veces al principio es decir demasiado. Quedó perfecto incluso en mi pequeño Spark. Viaja más cómodo mi bebé al dormir que en el Safety First del vehículo de mi esposa. Se siente robusto y aunque parece que exageran con los acolchonamientos, éstos no estorban ni incomodan al bebé. Recomendado al 100.

reviews.reviewTitle: Silla segura y facil de montar
reviews.reviewText: La silla es muy comoda y fácil de montar en el auto.
La mejor compra que he hecho en mucho tiempo. Mi bebe va súper cómoda, tiene 18 meses y nunca había viajado de mejor manera. Fácil de instalar.
Recién la instalamos, mi hijo se siente cómodo, pero lo mejor de todo son los puntos de seguridad que tiene. Súper recomendable!
Super recomendado, excelente asiento para poder transportar a tu bebé, muy seguro, cómodo, facil de instalar, todo muy muy bien la verdad.
